docs.text: Jan 2021 14/01/2021 Just completed reading Abhishek Thakur book « Approaching (almost) any machine learning problem ». It’s excellent 👌 A lot of topics covered, if you want to start a career in ML or just to refresh your knowledge I strongly advice on reading it!

docs.text: Just completed reading Abhishek Thakur book « Approaching (almost) any machine learning problem ». It’s excellent 👌 A lot of topics covered, if you want to start a career in ML or just to refresh your knowledge I strongly advice on reading it!
